verses.name: Matthew 8:13
verses.text: And Jesus said unto the centurion, Go thy way; and as thou hast believed, so be it done unto thee. And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour.

verses.name: Matthew 8:14
verses.text: And when Jesus was come into Peter’s house, he saw his wife’s mother laid, and sick of a fever.

verses.name: Matthew 8:15
verses.text: And he touched her hand, and the fever left her: and she arose, and ministered unto them.

verses.name: Matthew 8:16
verses.text: When the even was come, they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils: and he cast out the spirits with his word, and healed all that were sick:
